attributes.action: Hold a general Election so we can all express our disgust at sleaze in parliament and boot out greedy Mps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public daily losing their jobs and facing financial hardship deserve better .  Lets have MPs who share our financial burden not sponge off the people already suffering. "Let them eat cake could be MPs motto)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
